DataElement.preferredName: Total Urinary Or Fecal Incontinence Neurologic Function Scale Domain Clinical Score Assessment Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the total urinary or fecal incontinence neurologic function scale domain.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Total Urinary Or Fecal Incontinence Neurologic Function Scale Domain Clinical Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Involuntary passage of urine outside the body._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Involuntary passage of stool from the rectum._A specific area of neurological interest within the Raymond neurologic function scale, subdivided into 3 or 4 levels of function with scores based on discrete quantifiable measures._Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Neurologic Function Scale Assessment Score Value
